Headline: #34 South Michigan, #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/116th
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan and 119 Michigan/119th buses are temp. rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan, and #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/116th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/ residual delays after an earlier sick customer on the train at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier sick customer on the train at Fullerton. 
 
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Division.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
